summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2095, for the improvement of 31st Avenue South from Washington Street to King Street; King Street, from 32nd Avenue South to a point 100 feet west of the west margin of 31st Avenue South; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, and constructing concrete stairways and concrete bulkheads; under Ordinance No. 21189 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
